name: Fwego
description: Open source online no-code database and Airtable alternative. More information about persistent files on S3, scaling and installing a custom domain can be found on https://fwego.io/docs/guides/installation/install-on-heroku. Note that it might take a couple of minutes to deploy the app, so please be patient.

SECRET_KEY.description: A unique string that is used to generate secrets.

FWEGO_JWT_SIGNING_KEY.description: A unique string that is used to sign jwt tokens.

FWEGO_PUBLIC_URL.description: The public URL of your Heroku Fwego app. Don't forget to replace YOUR_APP_NAME with the name of your app.

FWEGO_AMOUNT_OF_WORKERS.description: The amount of workers per dyno. This value must be `1` if you want to run the free plan.
